news_header: Trump unhappy with Boeing's delayed Air Force One contract, considering alternatives, including used planes.
news_original_title: I'm not happy with Boeing, Trump says over Air Force One
news_text: US President Donald Trump expressed dissatisfaction with Boeing over delays in the Air Force One contract, indicating he may seek alternatives, including used planes. The contract for updated presidential planes has been pushed back to 2027 or 2028, and Trump previously renegotiated the deal, citing high costs. Boeing faced significant losses in 2024.
